files.description: This file contains the setup configuration for packaging the application using setuptools. It specifies package metadata including name, version, packages, install requirements, and console script entry points.
This file lists the dependencies required for the application, such as pytest.
Initializer file for the src package. Ensures the directory is treated as a Python package.
Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Parses each line into a dictionary containing surah number, ayah number, and verse text, and handles file not found errors gracefully.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file line by line, parses lines formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text' into dictionaries, and returns a list of these dictionaries. Handles FileNotFoundError by printing an error message.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: This module provides functions to search for words and phrases in Quran data. It supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches and includes functionality for searching within specific surahs.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses by iterating over the provided Quran data and checking if the search word is present in the verse text. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise performs case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in Quran verses by iterating over the provided Quran data and checking if the exact phrase is present. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise performs case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Searches for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data by filtering verses by surah number and performing a case-insensitive search for the word in the verse text.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: The loaded Quran data as a list of dictionaries.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. Loads Quran text from a file, performs a search for the word 'اللَّهِ', and prints the search results to the console.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function that orchestrates loading Quran data, searching for the word 'اللَّهِ', and printing the search results. Acts as the primary entry point for the application.

files.description: Initializer file for the tests package. Marks the directory as a Python package for unit tests.

Unit tests for the Quran search module. This file tests various scenarios for searching words and phrases in Quran data, including both case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches and specific surah searches.

classes.name: TestQuranSearch
classes.description: Test case class for validating the functionality of the Quran search functions.

methods.name: test_search_allah_word
methods.description: Test that searching for the word 'اللَّهِ' returns at least one verse using case-insensitive search.

methods.name: test_search_word_group
methods.description: Test the search_word_group function with both an existing and a non-existing word group, ensuring correct behavior for each scenario.

methods.name: test_case_insensitive_search_word
methods.description: Test the search_word_in_quran function in case-insensitive mode using a dummy dataset.

methods.name: test_case_sensitive_search_word
methods.description: Test the search_word_in_quran function in case-sensitive mode using a dummy dataset, verifying that only the correctly cased verse is returned.

methods.name: test_case_insensitive_search_word_group
methods.description: Test the search_word_group function in case-insensitive mode using a dummy dataset.

methods.name: test_case_sensitive_search_word_group
methods.description: Test the search_word_group function in case-sensitive mode ensuring that only verses with an exact case match are returned.

methods.name: test_search_word_in_surah
methods.description: Test the search_word_in_surah function by verifying it returns the correct verses for both existing and non-existing search terms within a specified surah.
